posts.title: HuggingFace Downloader
posts.text: Code pieces for downloading models from [huggingface](Hugging Face â€“ The AI community building the future.). Install12pip install huggingface_hubhuggingface-cli --help downloader.py123456789101112131415161718192021import osfrom huggingface_hub import hf_hub_download, snapshot_downloadrepo_id_list=[ # samples "laion/CLIP-ViT-B-16-laion2B-s34B-b88K", "laion/CLIP-ViT-H-14-laion2B-s32B-b79K", "openai/clip-vit-base-patch32"]# download to 'Models'for repo_id in repo_id_list: print("Start Downloading models for repo {}".format(repo_id)) local_dir = snapshot_download(repo_id=repo_id, local_dir=os.path.join("../Models",repo_id) , local_dir_use_symlinks=False, cache_dir="../.cache", resume_download=True, endpoint="https://hf-mirror.com", use_auth_token="hf_*************") print(f"Model file downloaded to {local_dir}") Run1python downloader.py
